and this is the kind of stuff you would stick posters to your wall with and I'm
going to use this just to hold the string straight so I'm just put it on
each end and pull a taut and I'll do that with both and I keep it about
one-and-a-half inches about three three and a half centimeters across as in

sticks lollipop sticks tongue depressors etc onto the string so
apply hot glue to the string I found it was easier to do this than to apply to
the matchsticks and then just start putting them in regular intervals so
I've used a bit of boots of speed here I thought that was a little bit too far

doesn't have to be measured so not making regular planks here so it's sort

give it that sort of haphazard rope bridge look and then just leave a little

occasion and you just want to push it into the blue and then apply on the
other side as well so you'll have then ropes on both sides and this creates
quite a nice effect now this is a nice long rope bridge what I'm going to do is
I'm going to cut it up into small sections you don't need to do this if
you have just two points you want to connect it across and you can make it
